name: Sactumaria
declaringWar: Goddess have deemed you as a threat, you must perish for the holiness
attacked: You will pay for your sins by attacking us, you sinner!
defeated: How is it possible that those Apes hurt us? The galactic senate will take care of them.
introduction: As superior galactic entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
neutralLetsHearIt: My ear is open to listen.
neutralNo: I'm sorry but I must refuse
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: All this fight just cost more suffering
tradeRequest: We bestow you our gift for the goddess

name: Republic Federation

defeated: Heh, you really a something else.

neutralNo: Sorry we have to reject that request.
Sorry, but maybe something better you got?
